item.description:
David is coming back to Fairfield!

Hormone Health: How To Get Bad Estrogen Out of Your Body, Have Better
Sex, Fight Cancer, Live Longer, and Healthier. Take advantage of
recent scientific advances in stopping breast, prostate, and other
cancers. Understand acne. Stop insomnia.

His April 2010 stop was a sell out event that saw over 200 people 

fill the Community Film Institute.

This event will be another sell out and David will be sure to Rawk the house!.

Ticket price will be $30 until June 1st!

at that time they will be raised to $35 (same as 2010)

Visit www.catchahealthyhabit.com/davidwolfe to reserve your spot!

DOORS OPEN AT 6pm!
item.name: David Wolfe @ Catch A Healthy Habit
